subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn won her fourth World Cup overall championship by winning a giant slalom race, the event that had once been her biggest weakness, and she appears to keep getting better.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn won her fourth World Cup overall championship by winning a giant slalom race, the event that had once been her biggest weakness, and she appears to keep getting better.
